name: Jira
title: A visual cheat-sheet for the 44 keyboard shortcuts found in Jira

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 44 keyboard shortcuts found in Jira

cards.title: Global Shortcuts
cards.body: | Shortcut | Action | | ---------------------------- | -------------------------------- | | `G` `D` | Go to Dashboard | | `G` `P` | Browse to a Project | | `G` `A` | Go to Agile | | `G` `I` | Go to Issue Navigator | | `G` `G` | Administration Search Dialog Box | | `/` | Quick Search | | `C` | Create an Issue | | `?` | Open shortcut help | | `Ctrl` `Alt` `D` | Dashboards drop-down menu | | `Ctrl` `Alt` `P` | Projects drop-down menu | | `Ctrl` `Alt` `I` | Issues drop-down menu | | `Ctrl` `Alt` `G` | Agile drop-down menu | | `Ctrl` `Alt` `S` | Form Submit | | `Ctrl` `Alt` \` | Cancel Form |

cards.title: Agile Shortcuts
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                        |
| -------- | ----------------------------- |
| `J`      | Next Issue                    |
| `K`      | Previous Issue                |
| `N`      | Next Column                   |
| `P`      | Previous Column               |
| `-`      | Expand/Collapse All Swimlanes |
| `T`      | Hide/Show Detail View         |
| `O`      | View Issue                    |
| `Enter`  | Add a New Line                |
| `Enter`  | Submit changes                |
| `Esc`    | Cancel changes                |
| `I`      | Assign to Me                  |
| `S` `T`  | Send to Top                   |
| `S` `B`  | Send to Bottom                |
| `E`      | Edit Issue                    |
| `Z`      | Projector Mode                |

cards.title: Issue Actions and Navigator Shortcuts
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                 |
| -------- | ---------------------- |
| `O`      | View selected issue    |
| `J`      | Next Issue             |
| `K`      | Previous Issue         |
| `U`      | Back to the Navigator  |
| `[`      | Hide/Show Left Section |
| `N`      | Next Activity          |
| `P`      | Previous Activity      |
| `F`      | Focus search field     |
| `Esc`    | Escape field           |
| `E`      | Edit Issue             |
| `A`      | Assign Issue           |
| `M`      | Comment on Issue       |
| `L`      | Edit Issue Labels      |
| `S`      | Share Issue            |
| `.`      | Operations dialog box  |
